casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Scoleri, Appellant.
Submitted April 19, 1971.
Before Bell, O. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
John W. Packet, Assistant Defender, and Vincent J. Ziccardi, Defender, for appellant.
Mark Sendrow and Milton M. Stein, Assistant Distinct Attorneys, James D. Grmoford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
October 12, 1971:
